title: The most delicious ice cream
text: We visited this place several times, the ice cream was the best, the stuff was very friendly and responsive.

title: Best gyros
text: We wanted food for take away, but the atmosphere was great and we decided to stay. All the food was delicious. We ordered kebap, gyros and french fries.

title: Excellent service
text: One of the best restaurants we visited in Athens. We asked for recommendation about the food and all of it was very delicious. And the service was excellent!

title: Must see
text: A logical extension of the walk to the Acropolis. Very rich collection and modern display of the whole site. The Karyatides are stunning, you can see them up close.

title: Amazing
text: It was my second time in Acropolis and it is never enough for me. A stunning historical, archaeological and architectural place. I recommend going there early in the day, because it takes a couple of hours to feel the stunning atmosphere.

title: We went for a dessert late at night and it was worth it.
text: The staff is very friendly and provides detailed information about the products. You can sit in the place and enjoy the desserts or you can take it away.
